channel.title: Some Problems HELP PLS
channel.description:
1st problem - How can i let my server all times online? 2nd problem - How can i make/edit items? 3rd problem - How to put max level 120? 4th problem - How can i made new shops?
nEEd hELp some one help pls

item.title: Some Problems HELP PLS
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

1:Either hoost it on your computer, or buy a vps with ram.(Depends on the players)
2:In items.cfg.
3:Umm somewhere in client.java or player.java, just keep searching 99 till you find something or the skill id.
4:In client.java add the wannaeshop, and then add it in shops.cfg

Read full topic
